timeline.bodyText: warning: Generating equals/hashCode implementation but without a call to superclass, even though this class does not extend java.lang.Object. If this is intentional, add '@EqualsAndHashCode(callSuper=false)' to your type. @EqualsAndHashCode
timeline.author: ekazachkova

timeline.bodyText: Could you please fix this test according to your another PR ?
timeline.author: ekazachkova
